description: Zoho Bigin is a simplified CRM solution from Zoho tailored for small businesses, focusing on pipeline tracking and relationship management

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_ADD_RECORDS
tools.description: Tool to add new records to a module. Use when you need to programmatically insert one or more records into Bigin after confirming module name and field API names. Provide required fields per module (e.g., Contacts requires Last_Name).

data.title: Data
data.description: List of JSON objects to insert. Each object maps Field API names to values. Max 100 records per call.

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: Array of workflow triggers. Default ['workflow'] executes workflows; use [] to skip workflows.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: The API name of the module to insert into. Allowed: Contacts, Pipelines, Accounts, Products, Tasks, Events, Calls

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_ADD_TAGS_TO_RECORDS
tools.description: Tool to add tags to a specific record in a module. Use when you need to categorize or label a record after creation or update.

inputSchema.title: AddTagsToRecordsRequest

items.title: Tag

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of an existing tag, if applicable

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the tag to add

items.description: Tag object to specify tag name and optional existing tag id.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: List of tag objects to add to the record

record_id.title: Record Id
record_id.description: Unique identifier of the record to which tags will be added

over_write.title: Over Write
over_write.description: Whether to overwrite existing tags (default: false)

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: API name of the module where record resides

inputSchema.description: Request model for adding tags to a specific record.

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_CREATE_TAGS
tools.description: Tool to create tags for a module. Use when you need to add new tags to a specific module in Zoho Bigin.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the tag to create

color_code.title: Color Code
color_code.description: Hex color code of the tag, e.g. '#FF5733'

module.title: Module
module.description: API name of the module where tags will be added

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_DELETE_ATTACHMENT
tools.description: Tool to delete an attachment from a record. Use when you need to remove a file after confirming its record_id and attachment_id.

inputSchema.title: DeleteAttachmentRequest

record_id.title: Record Id
record_id.description: Unique ID of the record from which to delete the attachment.

attachment_id.title: Attachment Id
attachment_id.description: Unique ID of the attachment to be deleted.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: API name of the module. Must be one of: Contacts, Pipelines, Accounts, Products, Tasks, Events, Notes.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for deleting an attachment from a Zoho Bigin record.

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_DELETE_RECORDS
tools.description: Tool to delete records from a module. Use when removing one or multiple records after confirming their IDs.

inputSchema.title: DeleteRecordsRequest

ids.title: Ids
ids.description: List of record IDs to delete

wf_trigger.title: Wf Trigger
wf_trigger.description: Whether to trigger workflow rules upon deletion

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: API name of the module to delete records from

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting one or more records from a Zoho Bigin module.

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_DOWNLOAD_ATTACHMENT
tools.description: Tool to download an attachment from a record. Use when you need the binary content of a specific attachment after confirming the record and attachment IDs.

inputSchema.title: DownloadAttachmentRequest

record_id.title: Record Id
record_id.description: The unique identifier of the record from which to download the attachment.

attachment_id.title: Attachment Id
attachment_id.description: The unique identifier of the attachment to download.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: The API name of the module containing the record. One of: Contacts, Pipelines, Accounts, Products, Tasks, Events, Notes.

inputSchema.description: Request model for downloading an attachment from a specific record.

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_GET_ATTACHMENTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve attachments for a record. Use when you need a paginated list of attachments for a given module record.

inputSchema.title: GetAttachmentsRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number for pagination, must be >=1. Default is 1.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated field API names to include in response. Up to 50 fields (e.g., File_Name,$file_id,Size,Parent_Id).

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Records per page, must be >=1. Default is 200.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving attachments of a record in a module.

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_GET_DELETED_RECORDS
tools.description: Tool to get a list of deleted records in a module. Use when auditing or restoring recently deleted data (recycle within 60 days, permanent within 120 days).

inputSchema.title: GetDeletedRecordsRequest

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of deleted records to retrieve: all (default), recycle (in bin ≤60 days), permanent (deleted ≤120 days).

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: API name of the module to retrieve deleted records from.

inputSchema.description: Path and query parameters for GET /{module_api_name}/deleted

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_GET_MODULES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of all modules. Use when you need to discover which modules are available in Bigin.

inputSchema.title: GetModulesRequest
inputSchema.description: No request parameters for retrieving modules.

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_GET_RECORDS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve records from a Bigin module. Use when listing or querying module data with specific fields, sorting, filtering, and pagination.

inputSchema.title: GetRecordsRequest

cvid.title: Cvid
cvid.description: Custom view ID to filter by a saved custom view.

page.title: Page
page.description: Page index for pagination. Defaults to 1.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of up to 50 field API names to retrieve.

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description: Field API name to sort by.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records per page. Defaults to 200, max 200.

page_token.title: Page Token
page_token.description: Token from previous response for beyond-2000 retrieval.

sort_order.title: Sort Order
sort_order.description: Sort order: 'asc' or 'desc'. Applies when sort_by is provided.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: API name of the Bigin module to retrieve records from.

inputSchema.description: Path and query parameters for GET /{module_api_name}

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_UPDATE_RECORDS
tools.description: Tool to update existing records in a module. Use when you need to modify one or multiple records after confirming their IDs and field API names. Supports up to 100 records per call; specify an optional trigger to control workflow execution.

inputSchema.title: UpdateRecordsRequest

data.title: Data
data.description: List of JSON objects to update. Each object must include 'id' and the fields to modify. Max 100 records per call.

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: Array of workflow triggers. Default executes workflows; provide [] to skip workflow execution.

record_id.title: Record Id
record_id.description: Optional ID of a single record to update. If omitted, all IDs in `data` will be updated in bulk.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: API name of the module to update records in. Allowed: Contacts, Pipelines, Accounts, Products, Tasks, Events, Calls

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating existing records in a module.

tools.name: ZOHO_BIGIN_UPLOAD_ATTACHMENT
tools.description: Tool to upload an attachment to a record. Use when you need to attach a file or specify a public URL for upload to a Bigin record. Ensure module_api_name and record_id are correct before calling.

inputSchema.title: UploadAttachmentRequest

file.title: File
file.description: Local filesystem path of the file to upload. Provide either this or attachment_url.

attachment_url.title: Attachment Url
attachment_url.description: Public URL of the attachment to upload. Provide either this or file.

module_api_name.title: Module Api Name
module_api_name.description: API name of the module to which the attachment should be added.

inputSchema.description: Request model for uploading an attachment to a specific record in a module.
